prompts: Create a small, adorable Pokemon that resembles a baby creature with a shell.
Imagine a playful fairy-type Pokemon with a round body and cheerful expression.
Show me a cute Pokemon that carries an egg and has a bright yellow head.
Design a Pokemon that radiates joy and happiness, perfect for a fairy garden.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that is known for its cheerful demeanor and friendly nature.
Make a Pokemon with a unique egg pattern that showcases a mix of colors.
Give me an illustration of a Pokemon that loves to play in grassy areas.
